sentences.en: It is only natural that he should resent you.
sentences.cn: 他会怨恨你是很自然的。

sentences.en: The time had come when Mary had forgotten to resent Martha's familiar talk.
sentences.cn: 到了玛丽不再厌恶玛莎唠叨的时候了。

sentences.en: They resent the implication that they have behaved irresponsibly.
sentences.cn: 他们对那种暗示他们的行为不负责任的言论非常不满。
